name: klimate parka jacket
description: Facilitating comfort, even in the most frigid temperatures, the Klimate Bib will keep you warm with 200 Gram Thinsulate™ Insulation, which helps control the rider's micro-climate without adding bulk. Ballistic nylons in strategic areas and durably waterproof GORE-TEX® fabrics will keep you protected and dry no matter what the conditions. As part of the Thermal Series, the Klimate Bib will keep you warm whether it is cold conditions or physiology that require it.

name: keweenaw parka jacket
description: Designed to protect the fastest riders in the most frigid conditions, the Keweenaw Parka integrates several types of highly technical Thinsulate™ Insulations, strategically comfort mapped to provide extra warmth where needed. GORE-TEX® Performance Shell fabrics provide a breathable yet waterproof barrier to keep the weather out while drawing moisture away from the skin and out of the garment. Equipped with a long list of technical features and functionality, this Parka will make even the longest and most extreme rides comfortable.

name: impulse parka jacket
description: Streamlined and versatile, the Impulse Parka can perform many functions and look sleek while doing so. This parka is equally capable of performing as a technical riding piece, with breathable, durable, waterproof and windproof GORE-TEX® Performance Shell fabrics, as it is functioning as a casual, all-purpose jacket. With an integrated hood, 100 gram Thinsulate™ Insulation and brushed tricot pockets the Impulse Parka will keep you comfortable and dry in a multitude of circumstances.

name: F4 helmet Gear'd
description:
In an effort to make one of the most comfortable motorsport helmets on the market even better, we’ve been collecting racer, customer and dealer feedback for improvements on the F4 helmet since it’s introduction. This newest version has implemented these improvements and the result is a helmet that is even more comfortable and better-fitting than the original F4.


Intake and exhaust ports have been significantly enlarged allowing more air to enter and exit the helmet.


The EPS liner shape has been modified in three ways. The cranial shape at the top of the helmet has been altered to allow a better fit on a wider variety of head shapes and also helps keep the helmet positioned correctly. The three large air channels that run laterally through the helmet were already some of the deepest offered in any helmet, but we have made them deeper in this version, allowing even more air to pass over the head and out of the helmet. The plenum chamber (inside the EPS) has also had its channels deepened, allowing an overall greater bandwidth of air to pass through the EPS to the rider’s head.


The comfort liner has been completely redesigned to implement the latest technologies in moisture-wicking fabrics. Moisture-wicking foam has strategically-placed perforations allowing a much greater amount of air to pass through the liner while enhancing comfort.


With an unprecedented 41 air-craving intakes, the F4 again establishes the newest standard in helmet ventilation technology. The helmet design is optimized to effectively channel air into the helmet where it is assisted by a network of air-channels in the the EPS liner to maximize airflow over the entire head. The result is a dramatically cooler and drier riding experience. The pocketable WINDSTOPPER® liner can be snapped onto the comfort liner in colder weather, which will still allow moisture to be moved away from the head while preventing air from directly contacting the head. Safety standards have been exceeded not only through the use of aerospace materials, but also in the design. The F4 exceeds Snell M2010 and U.S. DOT standards.

name: klimate glove
description:
• GORE-TEX® Waterproof/Breathable High Performance Liner
• GUARANTEED TO KEEP YOU DRY®
• 200 Gram Thinsulate™ Insulation
• Micro-Injected Logo
• Internally Reinforced Toughtek® Palm
• 3M Scotchlite™ Reflective Piping
• Abrasion Resistant Nylon Shell
• Ladder-Lock Wrist Adjustment
• One Hand Cuff Adjustment
• Guantlet Style Cuff
• Goggle Squeegee
